name: Are You Empowering Paper(less)?
content: Description: Since the last 40 years, the paper less concept is a mounting part of the healthcare industry. Everyone in the system has made efforts to incorporate the latest technologies in their system to use less paper and more technology. The following session is going to be in a relatable aspect by helping in learning the many uses of going paper(less). Also, you will significantly understand the difference between a paper (less) office and an office that uses less paper. We will talk about the extent of a paper (less) system in the security, communication and the productivity of your hospital system. Join the conference and improve your organization’s security, quality care and time saving benefits. Why Should You Attend? • To help your staff with easy multi-collaboration and instant access to everything they need. • The session will support you in understanding the benefits of switching to a paper(less) office and the imperial tools in use. • To bridge the gap between being paperless and becoming more productive in being paperless. Who Should Attend? • Physicians • Clinical and Office Staff • Compliance Officers • Administrators • IT Staff
